title: Woodland Whispers
description: In this project, I created concept art for Maplewood Games' debut indie title, 'Woodland Whispers'. The project involved designing the tranquil and whimsical woods of the game.

title: Elderguard
description: I led the character design in this project for Ironspires Games' RPG-maker game, 'Tales of Elderguard', where I focused on crafting detailed characters and armor sets. My work helped contribute to the game's medieval and fantastical atmosphere, enhancing it with intricate designs.

title: Crimson Hollow
description: I designed the grotesque and eerie creatures of 'Crimson Hollow', Nightveil Studios' psychological horror game that focuses on trauma and emotions. My role was to create unsettling monsters that embody the trauma, insecurities and fears of the protagonist, enhancing the chilling atmosphere with disturbing yet intricate monsters.

title: Unregistered Frame
description: In this project, I oversaw the concept art in our own studio's game, 'Unregistered Frame'. My designs focused on creating haunting, spectral enemies and the protagonist, blending eerie aesthetics with a sense of dread to amplify the game's supernatural themes.

title: Dream Paths
description: When working in this project, I created concept art for Kikiyama Studios' surreal exploration game Dream Paths. Inspired by abstract dreams, my designs aimed to evoke an unsettling yet mesmerizing atmosphere, with strange landscapes and characters that blur the line between reality and nightmare.
